description:
While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy’s appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die silberne Festung! – Ruffys und Bartolomeos großes Abenteuer!
Gin no Yousai: Luffy to Barto Daibouken
La forteresse d`argent. La grande aventure de Luffy et Barto
The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto`s Great Adventure!
Серебряная крепость! Приключения Луффи и Бартоломео!
الحصن الفضّيّ! مغامرة لوفي وبارتو العظيمة!
銀の要塞 ルフィとバルト大冒険
